title: 2B/2B, Energy-efficient laundry facilities, Courtesy patrol
posting_body: Take a moment to breathe as you step away from the hustle and bustle of downtown into the serene Bay Area city of El Cerrito.
Located in the heart of this electric and centralized neighborhood, you will find Del Norte Place Apartment Homes.
Here we’ve cultivated a community where residents can gather, connect, and have fun with thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Ceiling fans in living areas-Gourmet-style breakfast bar-Oversized double pane windows-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher-Private balcony or patio-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Built-in linen closet and additional storage-Fireplaces in select homes-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                        Featured amenity-Elevator access                                                                                        Featured amenity

24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Steps from the El Cerrito del Norte BART Station                                                                                         Featured amenity-Reserved parking                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Energy-efficient laundry facilities-Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
Only a small one-time payment-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Courtesy patrol-Co-working lounge
